text: Yoon Bo-sang (; born 9 September 1993) is a South Korean footballer who plays as goalkeeper for Sangju Sangmu in K League 1. ==Career== Yoon Bo-sang joined K League Classic side Gwangju FC in January 2016. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:South Korean footballers Category:Gwangju FC players Category:Sangju Sangmu FC players Category:K League 1 players
title: Yoon Bo-sang
